data.actual_result: Backtick markdown formatting only shows up on light theme
data.expected_result: Backtick markdown formatting shows up on both themes
data.short_description: Blocked messages don't show backtick markdown on dark theme
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you're on dark theme - Block a user - Have the user send messages containing backtick markdown - Observe the blocked messages - Change to light theme, and observe the blocked messages again
